commitMessage:
fix: Reduce blog post title sizes for better readability

- Adjusted title sizes from text-4xl/5xl/6xl to text-2xl/3xl/4xl on mobile
- Adjusted title sizes from text-4xl/5xl/6xl to text-3xl/4xl/5xl on desktop
- Reduced font weight from extrabold to bold for cleaner appearance
- Adjusted description text sizes and margins for better proportion
- Fixed prose heading sizes to match new title hierarchy
